body: A 15-foot burst of toxic gas hisses out of this stash. Living creatures within this burst must succeed on a DC 13 Will saving throw or become confused for 1 round. This is a poison effect.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Construct Modifications/Shatter Stash/Willsap Gas Stash
name: Willsap Gas Stash
